metadata.name: Untitled
metadata.description: The first in a series of 'Phygital Fawkes' paintings. 𝘜𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘵𝘭𝘦𝘥, 2021. Acrylic, oil, mixed media on canvas. 19" ×  15" (48.26 × 38.1 cm). Digital collectible certificate of authenticity on Bitcoin, as Counterparty asset A11164706467551366260, that "includes" shown JPG (4.8 MB 2140 × 2140 px), issued from 18VUJA4EXo7bGoyytjKLuyEfsgXQBfBRfD in block #710,506. The first collector of this SUPR token counterpart will receive both the Bitcoin NFT and physical painting (must reach out to me with Bitcoin wallet address, and physical mailing address to claim). NOTE: Art NFTs belong on Bitcoin. Currently, Counterparty is my preferred method to "mint" them, and Freeport wallet is the best way to do it using nothing but BTC.
